descripcion: Eikichi begins his career as a teacher-in-training expecting that he will get a class of attractive, nubile high school girls. When he is assigned a class of delinquents and blackmailers, only his tough love is able to win them over.
Interviewing at Holy Forest Academy, Onizuka meets his nemesis.
Onizuka befriends a bullied student.
Eikichi gets some lessons in the devious ways of his students.

titulo: An Eye for an Eye, a Butt for a Butt
descripcion: Onizuka takes revenge on a group of bullies in his own way.
The PTA threatens to fire Onizuka
When Onizuka visits a student's single mother, it brings nothing but trouble.
Eikichi faces down some dangerous bullies.

titulo: Onizuka and the Art of War
descripcion: The PE teacher Kukuroda challenges Onizuka.
To help a downtrodden student, Eikichi enlists her in a beauty contest.

titulo: To Be Idolized by a Nation
descripcion: Tomoko must conquer her fears on the day of the beauty contest.
Eikichi finds himself in a love triangle with a math teacher.
Onizuka must obtain his credentials after being placed on probation.

titulo: Between a Rock and a Hard Place
descripcion: Eikichi goes to an all-night study session.
Eikichi must rescue a student from a dangerous abduction.
Urumi finally opens up to Onizuka... on a rooftop.
Onizuka is blackmailed into buying a sushi feast with no cash.
Holy Forest Academy is under siege from Urumi's dangerous pranks.
A love letter is found in Murai's shoe box with the letter "F" on the envelope.
The female students boycott Fuyutsuki's clsas.
It is a race against time for Azusa as she assigns a student to find an heirloom - in a school about to be demolished.
A cursed chain letter has deadly foreboding for Eikichi.
Mr. Uchiyamada suspects that Onizuka do something bad with his daughter so he plans to stalking them.
A new sexy infirmary teacher catches everyone's eye. She is no any ordinary teacher, will Onizuka find out who is she really is?
Nao's scheme is more than meets the eye.

titulo: Whatever Can Go Wrong, Will Go Wrong
descripcion: Tomoko is exposed to the harsh reality of professional pageantry.
Miyabi has a nefarious scheme up his sleeve.
To make up for past mistakes, Onizuka promises to take the entire class to Okinawa.
Onizuk agoes for broke and gambles his future on a raffle ticket.
Miyabi must choose between her pride and a fate worse than death.
Eikichi, Tomoko, and Toshiyuki make an extraordinary discovery.
Mirai suspects a secret wedding when he spies his mother at a bridal boutique.
Teacher Fuyutsuki hears comments about her physical appearance and she decides to surprise people in the school.
Teacher Onizuka places the students in different rooms without their close friends to give them chance to know each other better. But some students complain about it.
Student Kikuchi mentions about a treasure to Teacher Onizuka and he makes a plan to find it.
Some of Teacher's Onizuka's students get lost and he tries to find them.
A student who fell in love with the another student confesses everything with help of Teacher Onizuka.
The real reason behind student Aizawa's hatred against the teachers is revealed in this episode.
Onizuka must use everything he has to save Miyabi from the Board of Education.
